page.title: 06Entertainment
page.content:
{ THE ABC CINEMA}was opened in 1937.In 1978 it became a triple unit.They employ 17 staff including 3 projectionists.In cinema 1 there are 670 seats;in cinema 2 ,199 seats and in cinema 3, 172 seats.The films are usually changed every Friday.There are about 150 films put on every year.
The manager of{THE CIVIC THEATRE}said it was opened in 1901,built by some business men in Halifax.Once it was a cinema but in 1961 it was sold to the Halifax Corporation who decorated it and refurnished it.The Civic Theatre employs 20 full time staff and 40_50 casual staff.
